Package ui

Class LayerList

java.lang.Object
ui.LayerList
public class LayerList
extends java.lang.Object

Layer List

A custom layer list UI element with visibility and layer re-arrangement features.

Each layer item has a move up and a move down buttons, which can be used to rearrange them. It also has a visibility toggle.

  • Constructor Details

    • LayerList

      public LayerList​(PApplet pApplet, Canvas canvas, int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Default constructor that creates a layer list UI element in with the supplied parameters.
      Parameters:
      pApplet - The handle for the PApplet
      canvas - The canvas which the layer list is associated with
      x - The X coordinate of the corner of the box.
      y - The Y coordinate of the corner of the box.
      w - The width of the layer box.
      h - The height of the layer box.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw()
      Draw call to draw the list. To be called every frame.

    • removeSelectedLayer

      public void removeSelectedLayer()
      Removes the currently selected layer and resets the selected layer index accordingly. Doesn't work if there is only one layer left, becuase that wouldn't make sense.

    • getCurrentLayerIndex

      public int getCurrentLayerIndex()
      Method to find which layer is currently selected.
      Returns:
      The index of the currently selected layer.

    • isInUpBox

      private boolean isInUpBox​(int x, int y, int index)
      Checks if a particular point is in the Up box of a particular list item.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate of the point
      y - The Y coordinate of the point
      index - The index of the list item to check for.
      Returns:
      True if the point is in the layer item's Up box.

    • isInDownBox

      private boolean isInDownBox​(int x, int y, int index)
      Checks if a particular point is in the Down box of a particular list item.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate of the point
      y - The Y coordinate of the point
      index - The index of the list item to check for
      Returns:
      True if the point is in the layer item's Down box

    • isInList

      public boolean isInList​(int x, int y)
      Checks if a point is anywhere within the layer list.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate of the point
      y - The Y coordinate of the point
      Returns:
      True if the point is anywhere within the list

    • isInListItem

      private boolean isInListItem​(int x, int y, int index)
      Checks if the mouse is within a particular list item.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate of the point
      y - The Y coordinate of the point
      index - The index of the list item to check for
      Returns:
      True if the point is in somewhere in the list item

    • isInVisBox

      private boolean isInVisBox​(int x, int y, int index)
      Checks if a point is within the visibility toggle box of a list item.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate of the point
      y - The Y coordinate of the point
      index - The index of the list item to check for
      Returns:
      True if the point is within the visibility box of that list item

    • click

      public void click()
      Handles a click within the layer list, deciding what action to perform depending on where in the layer list the click was.
